TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartPersonalization extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现低级别个性化设置操作。

span.span: Implements low-level personalization operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现执行更低级别的个性化设置操作所需的逻辑。This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations. 尽管类管理个性化的高级生命周期, 但是它是负责实际实现执行特定个性化操作所需的物理步骤的类。 Although the class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions. 类反过来依赖于的实现来与基础数据存储区进行通信, 以获取个性化信息。 The class in turn relies on an implementation of to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information. 如果你使用的默认实现, 则它将创建可通过引用属性使用的类的实例。If you use the default implementation of the , it creates an instance of the class that you can use by referencing the property. 例如, 若要访问属性, 请指定。 `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`For example, to access the property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类, 并提供有关个性化设置范围如何影响个性化属性结果的示例。The following code example shows how the class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties. 此示例包含五个文件:This example has five files: - 一个 .aspx 页面, 它以声明方式创建两个 Web 部件区域, 每个区域都有一个控件。An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control. - 一个名`Color.ascx`为的用户控件, 该控件允许用户更改一个个性化属性, 该属性基于用户的授权权限修改状态信息和输入共享范围。A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope. - 一个名`Persmode.ascx`为的用户控件, 该控件指示当前页范围是什么, 当前用户必须为哪些权限输入共享范围或修改数据; 它还提供两个按钮, 一个用于更改范围, 另一个用于重置当前用户个性化设置信息。A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information. - 用于授权用户的登录控件。A login control that is used to authorize users. - 一个 Web.config 文件, 其中包含一个节, 其中提供了一个示例, 用于授权用户修改个性化设置状态并输入共享范围。A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope. 下面的代码创建一个具有和两个 Web 部件区域的 aspx 页, 并`Color.ascx`显示和`Persmode.ascx`控件。The following code creates an aspx page with a and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls. 页面加载用于获取当前用户信息的登录页。The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information. 使用中[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]的 ASP.NET 网站管理工具来创建访问页面的用户。Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page. 请参阅 Web.config 文件, 以了解在配置文件中授予授权的用户的授权, 以更改作用域和修改状态信息。See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例代码创建一个登录页。The following example code creates a login page. 成功登录后, 它将重定向到主 aspx 页面。After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/login.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/login.aspx#5)] 下面的示例代码是此应用程序的 web.config 文件的一部分。The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application. 本部分说明如何为用户 (在本例中为 "用户 2") 设置授权, 以输入共享的个性化设置范围以及修改个性化设置状态信息。This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. 它还显示了角色的示例, 在此示例中为 "admin", 可用于允许 "管理员" 角色中的用户输入共享的个性化设置范围以及修改个性化设置状态信息。It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/web.config#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/web.config#2)] 下面的代码示例创建一个名`Color.ascx`为的用户控件, 该控件允许用户根据当前个性化设置范围和用户的授权权限, 更改个性化属性 (在本例中为两个文本框的背景色).The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/color.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/color.ascx#3)] 下面的代码示例创建一个名`Persmode.ascx`为的用户控件, 该控件显示当前个性化设置范围以及修改状态和进入共享作用域的用户权限。The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope. 它还具有用于重置当前个性化设置状态的重置按钮。It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#4)]

para.span: 类与控件和个性化设置基础结构的其余部分紧密协作。

span.span: The class works closely with a control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.

para.span: 个性化设置的默认实现是一个非常可靠的子系统, 应满足个性化需求。

span.span: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.

para.span: 在大多数情况下, 如果要自定义个性化设置, 则可以创建一个继承自的类, 从而创建一个用作个性化设置提供程序的数据提供程序。

span.span: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from .

para.span: 如果你想要创建一个与和类提供的不同的个性化设置子系统, 则应通过从派生并添加你自己的自定义实现来创建自定义实现编写.

span.span: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the and the classes, you should create a custom implementation by deriving from and add your own custom logic.

para.span: 然后, 通过从 中派生来创建自定义实现, 添加你自己的自定义逻辑, 并重写方法以返回自定义实现。

span.span: Then create a custom implementation by deriving from , add your own custom logic, and override the method to return your custom implementation.

para.span: 由于控件通过实例向个性化设置基础结构发出请求, 因此该控件不会直接与实现交互或保持对实现的引用。

span.span: Because a control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a instance, the control does not directly interact with or hold references to implementations.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将`true` 属性设置为, 则此方法将对实例调用方法, 以将个性化设置状态应用到提供的 Web 部件控件。 If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

span.span: Applies personalization data to the specified control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当父 控件请求将个性化设置数据应用于单个派生的类时, 将调用此方法。This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual -derived class when requested to do so by the parent control. 如果将`true` 属性设置为, 则此方法将对实例调用方法, 以将个性化设置状态应用到提供的 Web 部件控件。 If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

span.span: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示用户是否已授权可以进入 范围。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter scope.

value.span: 如果用户已授权可以进入 范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to enter scope; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户已`true` 在中获得授权, 则此属性返回。This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the to enter scope. 第一次调用属性时, 它将确定用户输入作用域并缓存信息的权限。The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter scope and caches the information. 如果在第一次调用此属性后修改了字典,则不会在对此属性进行后续调用时显示更改。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此代码是在类说明中找到的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeScope(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub ChangeScope (scope As PersonalizationScope)
abstract member ChangeScope : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope -> unit override this.ChangeScope : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope -> unit

param.name: scope
param.span: 当前页的新个性化设置范围。

span.span: The new personalization scope for the current page.

summary.span: 将当前页的 实例更改为指定的范围。

span.span: Changes the current page's instance to the scope specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将当前正在执行的页的个性化设置范围更改为`newScope`参数指定的新范围。This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter. 此方法是公共方法调用的受保护的帮助器方法。This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public method. 如果要在两个以上的可能范围内进行切换, 则存在此受保护的方法来处理将来的扩展性。This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between. 如果当前范围和`newScope`的值相同, 则此方法不执行任何操作。If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.

exception.span: 如果尝试从 范围切换到 范围，则当前用户不具有进入 范围的用户功能。

span.span: If attempting to switch from scope to scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter scope.

exception.span: 不是 枚举的有效成员。

span.span: is not a valid member of the enumeration.

Protected Friend Overridable Sub CopyPersonalizationState (webPartA As WebPart, webPartB As WebPart)
protected public: virtual void CopyPersonalizationState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartA, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartB);

abstract member CopyPersonalizationState : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.CopyPersonalizationState : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

param.name: webPartA
param.span: 提供个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.

param.name: webPartB
param.span: 接收个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.

summary.span: 从一个 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态，并将它应用于另一个 Web 部件控件。

span.span: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从中`webPartA`提取个性化设置状态, 并将`webPartB`其应用于。This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`. 此方法假定`webPartA`和`webPartB`具有相同的类型。This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type. 如果 Web 部件控件是控件 , 则此方法会将已`webPartA`包装的子控件中的个性化设置状态复制到包装在`webPartB`中的子控件。If the Web Parts controls are controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`. 作为复制操作的一部分, `webPartB`将被标记为 "已更新"。As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".

exception.span: 或 为 。

span.span: Either or is .

exception.span: 和 不是同一种 。

span.span: and are controls but one or both lack a child control.
-or-

exception.span: 和 是 控件，但它们的子控件不是同一种 。

span.span: and are controls, but their child controls are not of the same .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Enabled { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Enabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否请求启用关联 控件的个性化设置。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated control.

value.span: 如果启用个性化设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否请求为父控件启用个性化设置。This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent control. 请注意, 这是与和的目的相比, 这是一个微妙但重要的区别。Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of and . 只有在完成该控件的方法之前, 才能设置此属性。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在实践中, 这意味着 , 如果应禁用个性化设置, 则必须在元素上的页标记中设置属性。In practice, this means that the property must be set in the page markup on the element if personalization should be disabled. 此外, 还可以在`PreInit` 控件的阶段设置此属性。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 在完成关联 控件的 方法之后，进行了设置此属性值的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated control's method had completed.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnsureEnabled(bool ensureModifiable) cil managed

param.name: ensureModifiable
param.span: 布尔值，指示应进行哪种类型的检查。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.

summary.span: 确保 实例已完成初始化或当前用户具有修改个性化设置状态的权限。

span.span: Ensures that the instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是在多个方法中使用的帮助器方法, 可确保以下两种情况之一:This method is a helper method used in several methods to ensure one of two things: - 实例已完成初始化 (例如, 调用了方法并且已成功完成)。 The instance has completed initialization (for example, the method was called and successfully completed). 如果`ensureModifiable`参数等于`false`, 则执行此检查。This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`. - 或 --or- - 当前用户具有修改个性化设置状态的权限。The current user has rights to modify personalization state. 如果`ensureModifiable` 等于`true`, 则进行此检查。This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`. 该控件还在许多情况下调用此方法:The control also calls this method in a number of cases: - 如果为, 则将显示模式切换为 "正常"。To switch the display mode to something other than normal. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 添加、删除或移动 Web 部件控件。To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 连接、断开和编辑 Web 部件控件。To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 将 Web 部件控件导出到页面上。To export the Web Parts controls on a page. 实例必须已完成初始化。The instance must have completed initialization. - 导入 Web 部件控件。To import Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 当前用户不具有修改个性化设置信息的权限，或其他检查失败。

span.span: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
-or-

exception.span: 返回 。

span.span: returned .

summary.span: 从父 控件中提取个性化设置数据。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`, 并且在页面请求期间未重置个性化设置状态 (例如, 当属性为`false`时), 则此方法从父项中提取个性化设置数据。 在事件发生时进行控制。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent control during its event. 此方法对实例调用方法, 以从父控件提取个性化设置状态。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the parent control.

exception.span: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

exception.span: 或

-or-

summary.span: 当父 控件请求从 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置数据时，按照其请求执行。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`, 并且在页面请求期间未重置个性化设置状态 (例如, 当属性为`false`时), 则此方法从 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置数据指定的`webPart`。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`. 此方法对实例调用方法, 以从提供的 Web 部件控件中提取个性化设置状态。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.

span.span: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

exception.span: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to extract personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual string GetAuthorizationFilter (string webPartID);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAuthorizationFilter(string webPartID) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function GetAuthorizationFilter (webPartID As String) As String
protected public: virtual System::String ^ GetAuthorizationFilter(System::String ^ webPartID);
abstract member GetAuthorizationFilter : string -> string override this.GetAuthorizationFilter : string -> string

param.name: webPartID
param.span: 与要检索的筛选器关联的 Web 部件控件的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.

summary.span: 检索与指定的 Web 部件控件关联的授权筛选器（如果有）。

span.span: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.

returns.span: 指定的 Web 部件控件的授权筛选器。

span.span: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索与标识`webPartID`的 Web 部件控件关联的授权筛选器 (如果有)。This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`. 由个性化设置序列化和管理的每个 Web 部件控件都与`webPartID`一个参数关联。Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter. 在运行时, 页的控件可以通过确定每个 Web 部件控件是否获得授权来筛选页面上显示的控件。At run time, a page's control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized. 此授权信息以字符串的形式存储在与每个 Web 部件控件关联的数据中。This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.

exception.span: 在 为 的情况下，在页的生命周期中，过早地通过调用此方法进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter when is by calling this method too early in the page life cycle.
-or-

exception.span: 进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试，但是尚未加载任何个性化设置状态。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter and no personalization state has been loaded.
\- or

exception.span: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 。

span.span: The personalization state returned from the data store was .

exception.span: 为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: is or an empty string ("").

summary.span: 获取或设置默认个性化设置范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.

value.span: ，指示关联 的默认个性化设置范围。

span.span: The indicating the default personalization scope of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示在缺少先前有关适当范围的知识的情况下 , 应用于父控件的默认个性化设置范围。This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope. 如果未显式设置此属性, 则默认为返回范围。If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning scope. 只有在完成该控件的方法之前, 才能设置此属性。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在实际操作中, 这意味着必须在元素的页标记中设置。In practice, this means must be set in the page markup on the element. 此外, 还可以在`PreInit` 控件的阶段设置此属性。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 在完成关联 控件的 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated control's method had completed.

exception.span: 尝试为不是 枚举成员的 设置一个值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set a value of that is not a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果为当前的 实例启用了个性化设置且成功加载了个性化设置数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled for the current instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在加载个性化设置数据之前, 此属性将始终`false`返回。Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`. 例如, 此属性将`false` `PreInit`在阶段内返回。For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase. 在关联的方法成功完成之后 (在此过程中调用方法), 此属性将返回`true`。After the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called), this property will then return `true`. 此属性是受保护属性的可公开访问的别名。This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected property.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果此实例的个性化设置已初始化，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了个性化功能 (如果属性设置为`true`), 则在关联的 方法成功完成后立即将实例视为已初始化 (在此期间调用方法)。If the personalization feature is enabled (if the property is set to `true`), the instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called). 在加载个性化设置数据之前, 此属性始终`false`返回。Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前用户是否已授权可以修改状态信息。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.

value.span: 如果用户已授权可以修改状态信息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用此属性时, 它将缓存确定用户修改个性化设置状态的权限的结果。The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user's right to modify personalization state. 如果在第一次调用此属性后修改字典,则不会在对此属性的后续调用中反映更改。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此代码是在类说明中找到的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope Load() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function Load () As PersonalizationScope
abstract member Load : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope override this.Load : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 初始化个性化设置。

span.span: Initializes personalization.
A instance for the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是代表父控件初始化个性化设置信息的主要入口点。This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent control. 在父控件的方法中调用此方法。This method is called during the parent control's method. 通常, 如果在父控件上禁用了个性化设置, 则永远不会调用此方法。Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent control, this method will never be called. 在此方法的过程中, 将进行以下初始化:During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - 获取对默认个性化设置提供程序或在页标记或属性中指示的自定义提供程序的引用。A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the page markup or the property, is obtained. - 调用该提供程序来确定当前正在执行的用户的用户功能 ()。The provider is called to determine the user capabilities () for the currently executing user. - 当前页/用户/范围组合的个性化设置状态由提供程序 () 从基础数据存储区加载并存储在实例中。The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider () and stored within the instance. - 当前页/用户/范围的个性化设置范围由提供程序 () 确定。The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (). 请注意, 此确定的结果可能不同于属性的值。Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the property. 从此方法返回的范围值将用作属性的值。The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the property. > [!NOTE] > 仅当直接调用方法时, 才会出现因未启用个性化设置而导致的异常。An exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the method is called directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中, 实际调用内部帮助器方法来执行加载, 如果尚未为该页启用个性化设置, 则此帮助器方法将以无提示方式返回。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.

exception.span: 如果个性化设置未启用（ 等于 ），则调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called when personalization is not enabled ( equals ).
-or-

exception.span: 关联的 的 属性值为 。

span.span: The value of the property for the associated is .

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 控件的关联 实例的 属性的值是 。

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

exception.span: 页面标记或 属性中显式设置了一个提供程序，但未能找到该提供程序。

span.span: A provider was explicitly set in either the page markup or the property and the provider could not be found.
-or-

exception.span: 包含个性化设置状态数据的对象为 。

span.span: The object containing the personalization state data is .

exception.span: 加载和反序列化数据时出现问题。

span.span: A problem occurred while loading and deserializing data.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 配置文件中的个性化设置提供程序的定义出现错误。

span.span: An error occurred in the definition of a personalization provider in the configuration file.

exception.span: 基础个性化设置提供程序未能初始化，原因是未能找到默认提供程序或在尝试初始化个性化设置提供程序时出错。

span.span: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.

summary.span: 获取或设置个性化设置的提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.

value.span: 个性化设置提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回在页声明中为此属性设置的值。This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration. 如果未设置此属性, 则返回。If this property was not set, it returns . 在这种情况下, 页面使用配置文件中指定的默认个性化设置提供程序。In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file. 只有在完成该控件的方法之前, 才能设置此属性。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 这意味着必须在元素的页声明中设置属性。This means the property must be set in the page declaration on the element. 此外, 也可以在`PreInit`阶段设置此属性。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.

exception.span: 在完成 控件的 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the control's method has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetPersonalizationState() cil managed
abstract member ResetPersonalizationState : unit -> unit override this.ResetPersonalizationState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在基础数据存储区中重置当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据。

span.span: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重置基础数据存储区中当前页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据。This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store. 作为重置的副作用, 当前正在执行的页面通过调用重新执行。As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a call. 请注意, 此传输会按`GET`请求重新执行当前页, 而不考虑页最初请求的方式。Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested. 可随时调用此方法。This method can be called at any time. 此方法在内部调用提供程序的方法。Internally, this method calls the method on the provider. 成功重置数据后, 属性将设置为。 `true`After data is successfully reset, the property is set to `true`. 此属性用于实例中的其他位置, 以便绕过从控件属性提取个性化设置数据并在数据已重置时保存这些数据。This property is used elsewhere by the instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.

exception.span: 在用户未经授权可以修改个性化设置状态的情况下，进行了重置个性化设置数据的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to reset personalization data when the current user is not authorized to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 关联的 的 实例为 。

span.span: The instance for the associated is .

exception.span: 或

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.

abstract member Save : unit -> unit override this.Save : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据保存到基础数据存储区。

span.span: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件的事件中调用此方法。This method is called during the control's event. 在内部, 方法在提供程序上调用方法。Internally, the method calls the method on the provider. 当当前正在执行的用户不具有调用的功能 (在当前 实例中) 时, 尝试保存个性化数据将导致异常。Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called (within the current instance) results in an exception. 请注意, 仅当控件直接调用受保护的方法时, 这才为 true。Note that this would only be true if the control called the protected method directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中, 实际调用内部 helper 方法来执行保存, 如果当前正在执行的用户无权修改数据, 则此帮助器方法将以无提示方式返回。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.

exception.span: 当前的用户不具有称为 的功能。

span.span: The current user does not have the capability called .

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 当前没有任何个性化设置提供程序与 实例相关联。

span.span: No personalization provider is currently associated with the instance.

exception.span: 如果在调用 之前调用此方法，则可能发生这种情况（个性化设置提供程序引用是在调用 期间获取的。

span.span: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As PersonalizationScope

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取父 控件的当前个性化设置范围。

span.span: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent control.
A instance indicating the scope of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值最初是根据从方法返回的值设置的。This value is initially set based on the value returned from the method. 可以通过调用方法来修改此值。This value can be modified by calling the method. 请注意, 这表示用于应用和提取个性化设置信息的范围。Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information. 此属性的值可能与属性或方法不同。The value of this property might differ from the property or the method.

summary.span: 将父 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty() cil managed
abstract member SetDirty : unit -> unit override this.SetDirty : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将父 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将`true`属性设置为, 则此方法会将父控件标记为 "已更新"。 If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent control as "dirty". 根据 控件实例的实现细节, 此方法可能会调用安全检查和代码访问安全权限检查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks. 此方法在内部调用方法。Internally, this method calls the method. 请注意, 控件在内部跟踪 "脏" 状态, 并通过属性而不是通过此方法公开管理器的 "dirtiness"。Note that the control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the property rather than through this method.

exception.span: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

Web Parts Personalization Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void SetDirty (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed
abstract member SetDirty : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.SetDirty : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要标记为“更新”的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".

summary.span: 将指定的 Web 部件控件标记为具有已更改（即“更新”）的个性化设置数据。

span.span: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果将属性设置为, 则此方法会将指定的 Web 部件控件标记为 "已更新"。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty". 根据 控件实例的实现细节, 此方法可能会调用安全检查和代码访问安全权限检查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.

exception.span: 进行了将不受父 管理的 Web 部件控件标记为“更新”的尝试。

span.span: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

exception.span: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

member this.ShouldResetPersonalizationState : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页的个性化设置数据是否已重置（例如，已请求从基础数据存储区删除个性化设置数据）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).

value.span: 如果当前页的个性化设置状态已重置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 则表示当前页的个性化设置状态已重置, 并且应跳过从控件提取个性化设置数据和后续保存操作。If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped. 目前, `true` 如果调用方法, 此属性将由个性化设置基础结构自动设置为。Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the method is called. 请注意, 虽然可以设置此属性的时间不受限制, 但必须在`true` 控件的事件之前将属性设置为, 以使其生效。Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the control's event to have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ToggleScope() cil managed
abstract member ToggleScope : unit -> unit override this.ToggleScope : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将当前页的个性化设置范围从 切换到 ，或从 切换到 。

span.span: Switches the current page's personalization scope from to or from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法切换当前正在执行的页的个性化设置范围。This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope. 切换范围会导致返回当前正在执行的页。Toggling the scope results in a back to the current executing page. 如果在 Web 部件控件的导出或导入过程中调用此方法, 则此方法不执行任何操作。This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring. 如果切换范围请求是通过`POST`请求提交的页面发生的, 则在传输过程中将保留所有查询字符串值; 如果`GET`通过请求提交了页面, 则不会保留查询字符串参数。If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法。The following code demonstrates using the method. 此代码是在类说明中找到的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

exception.span: 在尝试从 范围切换到 范围时，当前用户不具有进入 范围的用户功能。

span.span: The current user does not have the user capability to enter scope when attempting to switch from scope to scope.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UserCapabilities As IDictionary
protected: virtual property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ UserCapabilities { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从授予当前用户的 获取用户功能集。

span.span: Gets the set of user capabilities from granted to the current user.

value.span: 包含授予当前用户的一组用户功能的 ，如果用户为匿名用户，则为空的 。

span.span: An containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty if the user is anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类当前包含两个指示用户功能的值: `modifyState`和`enterSharedScope`。Currently the class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`. 为了便于使用, 可以使用帮助程序属性和来检查字典中包含的功能。For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties and . 请注意, 在访问这些属性之一后, 对更改功能的限制;有关详细信息, 请参阅每个属性的 "说明" 部分。Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.
